description: Returns information about snapshots for a specified elastic cluster.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond this token, up to the value specified by max-results. If there is no more data in the responce, the nextToken will not be returned.

parameters.name: snapshotType
parameters.description: The type of cluster snapshots to be returned. You can specify one of the following values: automated - Return all cluster snapshots that Amazon DocumentDB has automatically created for your Amazon Web Services account. manual - Return all cluster snapshots that you have manually created for your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond this token, up to the value specified by max-results.

nested_items.name: snapshots
nested_items.description: A list of snapshots for a specified elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: clusterArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the elastic cluster.

nested_items.name: snapshotArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the elastic cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: snapshotCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the elastic cluster snapshot was created in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: snapshotName
nested_items.description: The name of the elastic cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the elastic cluster snapshot.
